name: Games
description: Professional screen replacement for all major smartphone brands with warranty. We use high-quality replacement parts that match OEM standards.

name: Laptop Battery Replacement
description: Genuine battery replacements for laptops with proper calibration. Extend your laptop's life with our high-capacity batteries.

name: Router
description: Complete virus and malware removal with system optimization. We'll secure your device and improve performance.

name: Tablet Repair
description: Diagnosis and repair for all tablet issues including charging ports, screens, and software problems.

name: Telephone
description: Professional data recovery from damaged or corrupted devices. We can recover photos, documents, and more.

name: Water Damage Repair
description: Emergency water damage treatment to save your device. Quick response increases chances of successful recovery.

name: Smartwatch Repair
description: Repair services for all smartwatch models including screen replacements and battery issues.

name: Operating System Install
description: Clean installation of Windows, macOS, or Linux with drivers. We'll ensure all hardware is properly recognized.

name: Charging Port Repair
description: Repair or replacement of damaged charging ports. Fixes intermittent charging and connection issues.

name: Camera Repair
description: Front or rear camera repair and replacement. Fixes blurry, black, or non-functioning cameras.

name: Motherboard Repair
description: Diagnosis and repair of motherboard issues including power problems and component failures.

name: Keyboard Replacement
description: Laptop keyboard replacement with original parts. Fixes stuck, missing, or non-responsive keys.

name: Speaker Repair
description: Repair or replacement of device speakers. Fixes distorted, quiet, or non-working speakers.

name: Home Button Repair
description: Repair or replacement of home buttons. Fixes unresponsive or stuck buttons.

name: Device Diagnostic
description: Comprehensive diagnostic for any device issue. We'll identify problems and recommend solutions.
